text: Ezɨ Pita itir puvatɨzɨma, Herot a gumazibav kemezɨma me Pita buriasa ghue. Egha me tong bar an apizir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨma an mɨdorozir gumazir Pitan ganiziba, Herot me isa kot gatɨgha egha ghaze, me aremegham. Egha Herot gɨn Judian danganim ategha, Sesarian nguibar ekiamɨn ikiasa uaghirɨ.
